data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is a subclass of Excel::Template and registers a new
    node type, CELLAUTOSIZE. As it inherits from
    Excel::Template::Element::Cell, and because new node types can be
    specified at several different levels of the Excel::Template
    hierarchy, this seems like an appropriate--albeit very
    long--namespace.
